steps.step: Add a setting allowing users to auto authorise new displays
steps.action: INSERT INTO `setting` (`setting`, `value`, `fieldType`, `helptext`, `options`, `cat`, `userChange`, `title`, `validation`, `ordering`, `default`, `userSee`, `type`) VALUES ('DISPLAY_AUTO_AUTH', '0', 'checkbox', 'If checked all new Displays registering with the CMS using the correct CMS key will automatically be set to authorised and display the Default Layout.', null, 'displays', 1, 'Automatically authorise new Displays?', '', 25, '', 1, 'checkbox');
UPDATE `pages` set title = 'Icon Dashboard', name = 'icondashboard' WHERE name = 'dashboard';

steps.step: Change the DataSet View module name
steps.action: UPDATE `module` set Name = 'DataSet View' WHERE Module = 'datasetview';

steps.step: Add M4V extension to Video module
steps.action: UPDATE `module` SET validextensions = CONCAT(validextensions, ',m4v') WHERE module = 'video' LIMIT 1;
UPDATE `setting` SET helptext = 'Should the CMS send anonymous statistics to help improve the software?' WHERE `setting` = 'PHONE_HOME';

UPDATE `setting` SET helptext = 'Key used to distinguish each CMS instance. This is generated randomly based on the time you first installed the CMS, and is completely untraceable.' WHERE `setting` = 'PHONE_HOME_KEY';
UPDATE `setting` SET helptext = 'Should the CMS send an email if a display is in an error state every time maintenance runs?' WHERE `setting` = 'MAINTENANCE_ALWAYS_ALERT';
UPDATE `setting` SET helptext = 'Should the CMS send future schedule information to clients?' WHERE `setting` = 'SCHEDULE_LOOKAHEAD';

INSERT INTO `setting` (`setting`, `value`, `fieldType`, `helptext`, `options`, `cat`, `userChange`, `title`, `validation`, `ordering`, `default`, `userSee`, `type`) VALUES ('EVENT_SYNC', '0', 'checkbox', 'If checked you will have an option to enable Synchronise this Event checkbox for applicable events', null, 'general', 0, 'Show Synchronise this Event checkbox on applicable events?', '', 55, '', 0, 'checkbox');

steps.step: Add syncEvent column to schedule table
steps.action: ALTER TABLE schedule ADD syncEvent tinyint DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL;
